name: Oh Pit-ful me!
description:
Your name is Connor  And im are a Gladiator,  a sacrifice for the spirit of the pit and you must fight for your life (and mine), sacrifice your enemies to the pits and be the last one to land safely, yes you have to jump inside a hole but- you know what screw it

Good luck!

Pit-ful Me is a physics plataformer/combat game, you move your character with Slingshot physics and throw all the enemies to any of the holes and be the last one in jumping off to safety
